pages.text: So, the first tier of the "Power" Form is very basic, however it is easily obtainable. There aren't any added effect's or passive bonuses, those are for the higher tiers!

So, the second tier of the "Power" Form is a bit more advanced, allowing you to have a different move-set and inflict a status affect on hit depending on if you have something in the off-hand or not! Firstly, if you do not have any item in the offhand, you will default to move-set 1 allowing you inflict "Withering" on your target! Secondly, if you have an item in the off-hand you will switch to move-set 2 and can inflict the "Weakness" status effect!

So, the third tier of the "Power" Form is the final and strongest form, allowing you to -once again, inflict an effect depending on your move-set, however you also get a passive bonus depending it as well! If you aren't holding anything, you gain "Strength II"! If you are, you will gain "Absorption II"!
